core

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Animation

  • public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    The Animation class provides tools for animating entities and GUI elements.
    Author:
    Ethan Vrhel
    See Also:
    AnimationHandler, AnimationLoader, Entity, GuiElement
